removeSensivity: cmd window size reset;cmd window density reset
javaLangHeadtrick: settings put global disable_gl_renderer 1;settings put global collect_stats 0;cmd thermalservice override-status 0
javaLangRemoveHeadtrick: settings delete global disable_gl_renderer;settings delete global collect_stats;cmd thermalservice override-status 1
libsLangOpt: settings put secure location_mode 0;device_config put battery adaptive_battery_management_enabled false;device_config put performance input_latency_reduction_enabled true;pm clear com.miui.powerkeeper
libsLangOptRemove: settings delete secure location_mode;device_config delete battery adaptive_battery_management_enabled;device_config delete performance input_latency_reduction_enabled
fpsJavaOpt: settings put system peak_refresh_rate 120;settings put system user_refresh_rate 120;settings put system thermal_limit_refresh_rate 120
fpsJavaOptRemove: settings delete system peak_refresh_rate;settings delete system user_refresh_rate;settings delete system thermal_limit_refresh_rate
sensivityMaximumLang: settings put global force_gpu_rendering 1;settings delete system pointer_speed;device_config put input filter_touch_input false;pm clear com.miui.touchassistant
sensivityMaximumRemoveLang: settings delete global force_gpu_rendering;device_config delete input filter_touch_input
